QuestData.Title: Do Unto Others
QuestData.Description: Their attack is imminent, $c. I need you to get in there and sever the head of the Scarlet Onslaught, literally!$B$BIt's not going to be easy... Abbendis is sure to be surrounded by a great many of her men.$B$BBring back her head and I'll see to it that you're properly rewarded for saving Venomspite.$B$BFail and don't even bother to return!
QuestData.LogDescription: High Executor Wroth at Venomspite has ordered you to return with The Head of the High General.
QuestData.CompletionText: Should I tell my forces to begin making our way toward Agmar's Hammer?$B$BOr did you manage kill the high general?
QuestData.RewardText: Let's see them bring her back to life without her head!$B$B<The high executor's laugh draws a number of furtive glances.>$B$BI'm a little concerned that you let this grand admiral get away, but you're still the $g hero : heroine; of the day, $n!$B$BTake your pick... you've earned it!
